title: 6 Food Trends That We Predict Will Reign Supreme in 2024 - PureWow
summary: Whole Foods Market predicts that 2024 will see a rise in plant-based foods, especially mushrooms, walnuts, tempeh and legumes. Shoppers are also increasing their purchases of high-protein foods such as tinned fish, cottage cheese and Icelandic yogurt, reflecting a growing desire for a higher protein diet.

title: Spinneys unveils 2030 sustainability strategy, targets net zero operations by 2040 - ZAWYA
summary: Spinneys, a UAE-based premium fresh food retailer, has launched its sustainability strategy, 'Better Together 2030,' outlining its commitment to becoming a more sustainable business. The strategy is built on five pillars:  Eat Well, Live Well, Sourcing for the Future, No Time to Waste, Inspired People, Stronger Together, and Embedding Sustainability. The company aims to achieve Net Zero operational emissions by 2040, increase its organic produce offerings, and promote sustainable sourcing and waste reduction initiatives.

title: FMCG Industry Trend Analysis 2024 - Kanvic Consulting
summary: The FMCG industry in India is undergoing significant transformation driven by the rise of e-commerce, changing consumer preferences, and new entrants.  Millennials and Gen Z are increasingly influencing purchasing decisions, favoring online channels, convenience, and sustainable products.  Existing FMCG players are consolidating through mergers and acquisitions, while new players are disrupting the market with innovative business models.
